modName: Batch file for beginning Sneak Thieves
summary: A small boost in the beginning to get your sneak-thief started.
descriptionHtml:
A small batch file to use at the beginning of your game, after creating your character.
What this file does: At the beginning of the game, lets you carry more loot. Adds perks to get you started on your career as a sneak thief in Skyrim.

Installation: Drop this file into ...SteamApps/common/Skyrim/data or wherever batch files work for you. (Some people recommend ...SteamApps/common/Skyrim)

Uninstall: Delete this file.

How to use this batch file. Open the console within the game, after your character has been chosen, and type \"bat startthief\" (without the inverted commas). Use it only once per game.

The text of this file goes:

;for carrying loot
player.modav carryweight 699
;for making poisons to add to your arrows and blade
player.addperk BE127 
player.addperk 58215 
player.addperk 58217
;for sneaking up behind people 
player.addperk BE126
player.addperk 58210
;for aiming your poison-tipped arrows 
player.addperk BABED 
;for wielding your poisoned blade 
player.addperk BABE4 
;for picking locks
player.addperk F392A 
;for picking pockets 
player.addperk BE124
author: Pro-Love Girl

files.name: Batch file for beginning Sneak Thieves
